ygData.subject: RE: Stein - No more
ygData.msgSnippet: On the enchanter board, Baelish references a charm/morph item bug. Does anyone have details on this one?
ygData.messageBody:
On the enchanter board, Baelish references a charm/morph item bug. Does
anyone have details on this one?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: HiFi Review [SMTP:hifireview@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:03 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein - No more
>
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> This is total BS. Players spent their entire savings and traded away
> lots of equipment to get a left hand holdable Int item which is now
> going to turn in to a melee-hand-only item. Why do we even play this
> game anymore? Verant is going to get a bill for my time wasted on a
> now useless item. 7/43? What a joke!
>
> Q
>
> --- "baelish.aust.com" <eq@...> wrote:
> > From: "baelish.aust.com" <eq@...>
> >
> > The stein is going to be nerfed. Forget the farming
> > such as what has been
> > going on below, because next patch it is outta here.
> >
> > http://eq.castersrealm.com has the details.
> >
> >
> > - Baels.
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <Baltoro@...>
> > To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 3:04 PM
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein
> >
> >
> > > From: Baltoro@...
> > >
> > > I've done it 4 times and will do it again twice
> > tonight. This is to
> > replace
> > > the 4 I sold or traded, will have one for myself
> > and one for the druid who
> > is
> > > helps me gather the ingredients.
> > > The 4 steins have really raked in untold riches,
> > by my count 4000
> > platinum, a
> > > pair of dwarven workboots, Shimmering orb, the
> > list goes on and on.
> > >
> > > After doing it 4 times I decided to go to kaladim
> > and see how my faction
> > > decline was progressing. I found the guards
> > glowered at me dubiously
> > > including the king himself. I went out to the
> > chessboard, ruins, etc and
> > > bought 90 bone chips for 1g each from the people
> > hunting and turned them
> > in a
> > > few at a time to improve my faction. After that,
> > the king regarded me
> > > indifferently but the guards still regarded me
> > dubiously. What if another
> > > new quest pops up that requires us to go to
> > Kaladim? I don't want to
> > think
> > > about it. After I get the 2 steins tonight I will
> > charge 2000 platinum to
> > > complete the quest for someone provided they
> > gather the ingredients
> > > themselves. For weeks i'm gonna save up
> > bonechips till I have about 300
> > and
> > > go back to turn them in if the guy deals with me
> > anymore. Hell, i'm not
> > even
> > > sure if its worth 2000 plat for the hits
> > anymore....
> > >
> > > Orbane Encephalon
> > > 22 Enchanter
> > > Fenin Ro
> > >

> > ----------------------------
